title: Rage Runner
description:
Rage Runner is a fast paced 3D runner that will challenge your memory and reflexes.  Blast through miles of trench as you avoid an onslaught of fast and furious obstacles.  

Also includes a level editor.
1.4.3 Changes:
* Performance improvements for obstacle-heavy scenes
* UPDATED Levels K1, 3-5, 7 have been tuned and enhanced
* FIXED Ship now rotates when vertical
* FIXED Reset shield count on death
* FIXED Lens flares now properly vanish when obscured by an object

1.4.0 Changes:
* UPDATED Powerup mechanics - powerups are now generic and the player chooses which ability to use
* ADDED super thruster powerup
* ADDED special FX to missiles and camera
* ADDED inspirational quotes to rally the player
* FIXED level editor bug that prevented changing materials, music and time

----

To see the privacy policy and a list of attributions for Rage Runner, please visit:
http://ragerunner.hypercanestudios.com
overview: Released in February 2014 by Hypercane Studios.

products.name: Rage Runner
products.description: A fast-paced runner that will challenge your memory and reflexes AND build your self-efficacy!
